title: Champion select skin missing.
body:
I dont know the status regarding the other champions, but  Zac chromes skins are missing.

Anyone else who noticed their champion is missing a few skins post here.

replies.body:
Hey XLucaXBlightX,

This is a known issue, along with a few other things that we'll be fixing over the next couple of patches. We have a similar issue with ward skins not being selectable in Champion Select. These issues will be resolved in 6.2, from what I understand.

That said, your content is still in your account.

Thanks for the report! :]
Does nobody read or search before posting issues like this? there's literally hundreds of threads about chroma skins.
This is a known bug will be fixed in 6.2
